title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, June 19, 2021
description: Today is Juneteenth, also known as "Freedom Day" or "Emancipation Day." It's a holiday commemorating the end of slavery in the United States.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is Juneteenth, also known as "Freedom Day" or "Emancipation Day." It's a holiday commemorating the end of slavery in the United States.
